title: Cannot install on camera-less device
label: [Label(name="Features")]
body:
Due to way AndroidManifest.xml is written, SparkleShare-Android cannot be installed on device without camera (or at least Market and package manager filters it out from compatible list for such devices).

Use should add:

<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="false" />

to mark camera as optional, see right pane at http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/manifest/uses-permission-element.html for more info.
